noteIntroduction.text: The badge configuration is used to control how child components behave. Any configuration options set here will always be superseded by the child component.

noteDepth.text: You should use these options when you need to control the behaviour of all the components in context. Be aware that applying these changes may have undesired results on some components depending on how they have been configured.

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/html/heading

headingTrim.fieldDescription: Enabling this will automatically trim the heading to the maximum length set.
headingTrim.name: ./badgeTitleTrim

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

headingTrimMaxLength.fieldDescription: The total of number of characters before the heading is trimmed.
headingTrimMaxLength.name: ./badgeTitleTrimLengthMax

headingTrimSuffix.fieldDescription: Set a custom suffix that will appear at the end of the trimmed heading.
headingTrimSuffix.name: ./badgeTitleTrimLengthMaxSuffix

summaryTrim.fieldDescription: Enabling this will automatically trim the summary to the maximum length set.
summaryTrim.name: ./badgeSummaryTrim

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/common/true-false

summaryTrimMaxLength.fieldDescription: The total of number of characters before the summary is trimmed.
summaryTrimMaxLength.name: ./badgeSummaryLengthMax

summaryTrimSuffix.fieldDescription: Set a custom suffix that will appear at the end of the trimmed summary.
summaryTrimSuffix.name: ./badgeSummaryLengthMaxSuffix

cardIcon.rootPath: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-style-icon
cardIcon.name: ./cardIcon

cardStyle.fieldDescription: Apply custom styles to every card in context.
cardStyle.rootPath: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-style-modifier
cardStyle.name: ./cardStyle

target.fieldDescription: How should the link behave when clicked?
target.name: ./badgeLinkTarget

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-dialog/html/linktarget

text.fieldDescription: Override the text that appears on each link.
text.name: ./badgeLinkText

title.fieldDescription: Override the title that appears on each link.
title.name: ./badgeLinkTitle

style.fieldDescription: Apply custom styles to every call to action in context.
style.rootPath: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-style-modifier
style.name: ./badgeLinkStyle

format.fieldDescription: Apply a custom format type to every call to action.
format.name: ./badgeLinkFormatted

datasource.path: /content/cq:tags/${(empty tenant.id and empty tenantId) ? 'aemdesign' : (empty tenant.id ? tenantId : tenant.id )}/component-style-theme/details/contact-details/format/action
